metadata.title: CVE-2019-7165 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow in DOSBox 0.74-2 allows attackers to execute arbitrarycode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dosbox - 0.74-3-1
dosbox-debug - 0.74-3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dosbox package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.74-3-1').
